artist: Hugo Gellert, International Workers Order, New York
creditline: Gift of Mary Ryan and Bruce Lebowitz
inscription: on inner left side of folded sheet; in LLC, in pencil: HG-66 (16)
portfolio: "Century of the Common Man: Two Speeches by Henry A. Wallace" portfolio
provenance: Mary Ryan and Bruce Lebowitz, New York; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: LRC in margin, in black ink: HUGO GELLERT
text: An outline drawing of a handshake floats like a giant banner above a view of audience members at a political meeting. In the foreground are three men: one white, one black, and one Asian. They face the same direction and have serious expressions on their faces.
title: Century of the Common Man: Learning to Think and Work Together
